description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Shmup action with different ships, customizable weapons, armors and shields.  Choose your ship and upgrade your weapons as you play.  Battle through 9 levels and fight intense boss battles.  Adapt your ship to the levels you play or just plow through the enemies using skill alone.
description.short: Shmup action with different ships, customizable weapons, armors and shields.  Choose your ship and upgrade your weapons as you play.  Battle through 9 levels and fight intense boss battles.  Adapt your ship to the levels you play or just plow through the enemies using skill alone.
